name: Daniel Sarmiento
text: Wonderful place to come for pizza and a beer! Not crowded, has excellent selection of booze, and great pricing. Had a large pizza with half bacon Bleu and half carnivore toppings, quality of the pizza was excellent and I had a great …More

name: sahil dosaj
text: I stopped by here with my family for dinner. I was amazed with the options for vegetarians and vegans! The servers and manager were polite, courteous and helpful. The food came out fresh , hot and in a timely manner. Our pizzas were …More

name: L. Riggins
text: Somewhat tasty, fresh food including pizza, sandwiches, and salads. The menu is not very extensive, but good if they have what you like. You order at the counter and seat yourself while you wait to be served. The offer a vegan pizza if that interests you as well.

name: Michael Rukavina
text: Good, quick and clean. We were down in the area doing some work and stopped in for lunch. I would definitely go there again. Also saw that they are now doing take and bake which is pretty awesome.

name: Mia Strong
text: As far as quick service pizza, this is about as good as it gets. I used to be a Blaze fan, but I gave this place a try, and I was really impressed. The crust is fluffy and chewy with a slight flake, which is a huge step up from the pizzas …More

name: Demonica Luna
text: Love this place! Great food and great people. A very chill place. The pizza is amazing and they have a nice selection of local craft brews.

name: Zane Le' Geire
text: Pleasant serving staff with a good selection of pizza preferences. Also, affordable lunch options.

name: Adrian Gummy
text: Great pizza. Lunch prices are the best. 1$ soda, and $2 per slice of pizza. Easy, fast lunch when you're on the go.

name: James Dibelka
text: One star because I can't go any lower. Every part of my experience was the worst I've ever had from any pizza place. The service was trash (they actually laughed at me) and the pizza was absolutely flavorless. On top of that, I ordered more …More

name: Phyllis Douglass
text: I’ve ordered from zPizza for a couple years because they have gluten-free crust and vegan cheese. My last two gluten free pizza orders were not good. This last one especially. It was undercooked and cold. The pepperoni wasn’t heated in the …More

name: sedrick emery
text: Everyone was friendly and made my visit comfortable

name: Kim Stroud
text: I just wanna say that Mrs Naimi was great!! Wow!!! She keeps the business going... thank you sweetie!!!

name: Leyla Johnson
text: I order through eat24 a lot.  I usually have no problem, and the food arrives quickly, and I enjoy what I'm eating.  In fact, the only times that I've had issues when ordering through eat24 have been the 2 times I ordered Zpizza.  Once was …More

name: Saadullah Bashir
text: Delicious pizzas. Large selection of gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan options. Dog-friendly patio seating.

name: Amie L
text: It's just alright, I expect the vegan pizza to have more cheese but instead the pizza I ordered was a little too dry and the dough in the middle are a bit too soggy (not enough crust). I prefer the one in Rancho Cucamonga. …More

name: P Chakravarti
text: PERMANENTLY CLOSED; was good!

name: Brian Dillard
text: Place with lots of different choices for pizza. Overall we have been happy here, and were especially impressed because they offer vegan options for those of us that can't eat dairy.

name: Michael Curtis
text: Terrible experience; my wife ordered two pizzas, called back an hour later and they told us the order was never confirmed. They wanted to argue the fact and not offer a solution. First bad experience at a Zpizza, first and last time I will buy pizza at this location. Great job guys way to handle business!

name: Joshua Elder
text: Great food and fun atmosphere. We relaxed after dinner and played some board games they had available.

name: DARRELL LIDDELL
text: Good thin crust pizza. They have many fresh choices to choose from.

name: Elizabeth Haack
text: Took forever to get just a slice of pizza. The rustica pizza took 20 minutes!!! So disappointing! My slice was soo thin and had hardly any cheese and was burnt.

name: Daniel Fernandez
text: Pizza was ok like all Zpizza but I can’t believe they served your pizza in the cheapest paper plate. I think they purchase it in 99c store.

name: Greg Viloria
text: Great pizza. Good service. Comfortable.

name: Yousuf Hafuda
text: I have tried several of the pizzas, and it seems like their commitment to organic pizza has translated to very bland, tastless food. There was hardly any sauce in the pizzas I ate, and surprisingly even the margherita pizza I had was worse …More

name: Rowan Gorski
text: Got delivery through Eat24 and everyone was super nice and the food is delicious! will definitely order again!

name: Scott Lawrence Lawson
text: Decent pizza, always consistant. They are expanding their menu so the "rusticas" are now called "flatbread", which is confusing. I like you can get a slice or two a-la-carte.

name: DORIS MIDYETT
text: Best Gluten Free and regular pizza we've had. Our favorite!

name: Cuatro Veinte
text: Employees there are great try to get a discount online when I ordered didn't go through when I got there they gave me the discount Pizza is great

name: Robbie Church
text:
How do u make a calzone pizza with no cheese? Only at zpizza

Fyi check to make sure u get ur ranches and marinara sauce!!!

name: Laura Grant
text: Great dough, great quality toppings, great people.

name: Catie Lamb
text: The Thai pizza is the best & the customer service is awesome!

name: Marquesha Fells
text: I ordered on grub hub. I added a few extra things to my pizza. Paid the extra fees and did not get the pizza I paid for. I really like zpizza but this experience wasn't so great

name: Mister Cantrell
text: Good pizza, buy the slice offerings may run out early

name: Angel Gallegos
text: was hungry for a quick bite and got a slice of barbecue chicken - slice was nice and big with tons of toppings and chicken for under $3 - would come back again to try other combo

name: anton
text: great pizza but staff has been slipping lately.

name: Carolyn Lyons
text: Delicious and good vegetarian options

name: Pedro Ceron
text:
(Translated by Google) Super good

(Original)
Super bueno
